system.description: Also at 2nd level you treat spells of the nature  school as wizard spells and can copy them into your spellbook for the normal cost in time and money per level. Only other Hedge Mages can copy them from your spellbook, however. You also permanently have the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6l4bmc7ovgcn2c9k]{Find Familiar} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z5a26lxyh3esw2rl]{Speak with Animals} spells prepared, and they do not count against your maximum number of spells prepared. You may cast them as rituals normally. Finally, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.5o1rvwzxmsh5ji9i]{Druidcraft} cantrip, which does not count against your maximum number of cantrips known.
